thread.title_full: Braintrust Announces Registration for Upcoming Scrum Certification Classes in Salt Lake Valley

author: Michael Bell
title: Braintrust Announces Registration for Upcoming Scrum Certification Classes in Salt Lake Valley
text:
The Braintrust Consulting Group, a worldwide leader in Agile transformations, announces open registration for Scrum certification classes, Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) and Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO), the week of October 5-9, 2015 in Murray, Utah. The Braintrust Scrum certification classes are intended to teach attendees how to learn, plan, and implement Agile processes with the goal of increasing predictability of delivery, decreasing time-to-market, and improving overall client satisfaction. All certification classes are full of practical, real world techniques that attendees can implement immediately.
Braintrust’s Certified ScrumMaster (October 5-6) class is an in-depth two-day immersion into the world of Scrum. This class is ideal for IT Professionals (Architects, BAs, DBAs, Developers, Testers, etc.), IT Leadership (Managers/Directors/VPs/CIOs/CTOs), and Project Managers. Members of the Project Management Institute will earn 14 Professional Development Units (PDUs) toward maintaining their existing credentials by attending this class.
To learn more about Braintrust’s Certified ScrumMaster training or register for this class, please visit http://www.braintrustgroup.com/class/certified-scrummaster-csm-salt-lake-city-ut-5-6-october-2015/ .
Braintrust’s Certified Scrum Product Owner (October 8-9) class offers attendees a two-day in-depth immersion into the world of Agile Product Management. This class is ideal for Product Managers/Business Analysts, Functional/Operational Managers, Project Sponsors, and IT Leadership (Managers/Directors/VPs/CIOs/CTOs). Members of the Project Management Institute will earn 14 Professional Development Units (PDUs) toward maintaining their existing credentials by attending this class.
To learn more about Braintrust’s Certified Scrum Product Owner training or register for this class, please visit http://www.braintrustgroup.com/class/certified-scrum-product-owner-cspo-salt-lake-city-ut-8-9-october-2015/ .
Braintrust President, Brian Rabon said, “As part of the Salt Lake City area business community, we are proud to host these classes and contribute to the growth of IT industry talent. Technology-based companies are an integral part of expanding the Salt Lake City area economy, and Braintrust offers world-class training to this growing technology industry that ranks as one of the top in the U.S.”
Kate Megaw, CST, PMP, will lead the CSM class. Megaw holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Information Management from The Queen’s University of Belfast, Northern Ireland. Kate Megaw is a Certified Scrum Trainer (CST) from the Scrum Alliance and a Project Management Professional (PMP) from Project Management Institute (PMI) and the Chief Operating Officer (COO) with The Braintrust Consulting Group. With over 12 years of industry experience, Megaw has managed and led teams for global companies like XcitekSolutionsPlus (XSP) and H&R Block.
Brain Rabon , CST, PMP, will lead the class. Rabon is the president of The Braintrust Consulting Group and holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science from Auburn University and a Master’s Degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Alabama at Birmingham. Throughout his 16 years of IT industry experience, Brian has applied Agile methods in order to successfully delivery working product to his customers.
The professional development training classes will be held at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Salt Lake City South---Murray.
Attendees are encouraged to register through the website in advance. Individual attendee and group pricing are available. To learn more about the Agile approach to training and other upcoming classes in the Salt Lake City area, please visit http://braintrustgroup.com/tour/salt-lake-city/ .
About The Braintrust Consulting Group
The Braintrust Consulting Group is the premiere leader in training and coaching in the field of Agile. Through practical, hands-on training and enterprise and team coaching, Braintrust’s experienced instructors lead professionals through the process of planning and implementing Agile processes, such as Scrum and Kanban. The Braintrust approach blends people, process, tools, and training into one seamless formula in order to increase predictability of delivery, decrease time-to-market, and improve overall client satisfaction. A worldwide leader in Agile transformations, Brainstrust is based in Salt Lake City, Utah, Birmingham, Alabama, and Los Angeles, California.
